name: simplicite
description: Simplicite(R) platform Javascript API (for node.js and browser)

scripts.build: sed -i "s/\(@module \).*$/\1$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/;s/\(@version \).*$/\1$(jq -r '.version' package.json)/;s/\(@license \).*$/\1$(jq -r '.license' package.json)/" src/simplicite.js && uglifyjs src/simplicite.js --comments -o dist/simplicite.min.js

author: Simplicite Software <contact@simplicitesoftware.com> (http://www.simplicitesoftware.com/)
